DPRK Foreign Minister Meets Ugandan Minister
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Minister Meets Ugandan Minister 
    Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun on Sept. 8 met and had a friendly talk with Tom Butime Rwakaikala, minister of State for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Uganda, who paid a courtesy call on him.
 Present there were an official concerned and the Ugandan ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Il from Japanese Figures
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Il from Japanese Figures 
    Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received floral baskets from Chairman Kosuke Tokida of the Ichihara Society for Korean Studies in Chiba Prefecture, Japan, Secretary General Masakazu Yokobori of the Japan-Korea Society for Scientific and Educational Interchange, Japanese  photographer Takasi Ito, Lecturer Masataka Mori of Shizuoka University of Japan, Representative Husatosi Huchisawa of the Japanese "Society for Love and Peace" and Representative Takeo Imoto of the Society for Japan-Korea Friendship Promotion on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of the DPRK.
 Written on the ribbons of the baskets were letters "We Sincerely Wish His Excellency Great General Secretary  Kim Jong Il Good Health."    
 Meanwhile, Kim Jong Il received a gift from Representative Noboru Kameda of the Society of Japan-Korea Culture on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Military Parade and Mammoth Demonstration Held
DPRK to Steadily Increase Its Nuclear Deterrent Force
articles.content:
DPRK to Steadily Increase Its Nuclear Deterrent Force 
    Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The DPRK will continue to increase its nuclear deterrent force as a means for just self-defence in order to defend the sovereignty of the country as the United States has not yet shown its will to drop its hostile policy toward the DPRK despite the DPRK's good faith and magnanimity. Kim Yong Chun, chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army, declared this in his speech at the parade and mammoth demonstration held here today to celebrate the 55th anniversary of the DPRK.
 He stated.    
 The Korean People's Army will unite close with the people and foil the moves of the U.S. imperialists to isolate and stifle the DPRK from the toughest stand. If they ignite another war in this land the Korean army and people will deal merciless crushing blows at them and achieve the historical cause of national reunification without fail.

Russian Folk Dance Troupe Here

Russian Folk Dance Troupe Here
    Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The Russian Moiseyev State Academy folk dance troupe led by its Manager Yelena Shervakova arrived here today.
 It was met at the airport by Vice Department Director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Ji Jae Ryong and a councilor of the Russian embassy here.

Gifts to Kim Jong Il from Juche Idea Followers
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Il from Juche Idea Followers
    Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) --Leader Kim Jong Il received gifts from the director general and the secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and the chairman of the Organization for the Study of Juche Idea of Thailand.
 The gifts were conveyed to an official concerned by Director General Vishwanath, Secretary General Kenichi Ogami and Chairman Songchit Pullarp on Sunday.

Nepalese Party Delegation Here
articles.content:
Nepalese Party Delegation Here
    Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Nepali Congress (Democratic) led by Shiba Bahadur Khadka, permanent member of the Central Executive Committee, arrived here on Sunday.
 It was greeted at Pyongyang Railway Station by Kim Thae Jong, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.    
 A delegation of the China Foreign Languages Press Publishing and Distribution Administration led by Cai Mingzhao, deputy director of the Information Office of the Council of State and director of the administration, arrived in Pyongyang on the same day.

Families of Those Related to Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Struggle Here
articles.content:
Families of Those Related to Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Struggle Here
    Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Family members of Zhang Weihua and of Zhou Baozhong, Feng Zhongyun and Kim Sun Ok who were related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle arrived here on Sunday on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of the DPRK.
 They were greeted at Pyongyang Railway Station by Ri Kwang, vice-director of the History Institute of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and other officials concerned. Ri Hak Yu, a family member of Son Won Thae, flew here on Sept. 6.

Greetings to Brazilian FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Brazilian FM
    Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to Celso Luiz Nunes Amorim, foreign minister of Brazil.
 Extending warm congratulations to the foreign minister on the occasion of the independence day of Brazil, the message wished the foreign minister success in his responsible work for the independent development of the country.

articles.title: Russian Presidential Envoy to Far Eastern Region Arrives
articles.content:
Russian Presidential Envoy to Far Eastern Region Arrives
    Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Konstantin Borisovich Pulikovski, presidential envoy to the Far Eastern Region of the Russian Federation, and his party arrived here today.
 They were met at the airport by Vice-Chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK Yon Hyong Muk, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kung Sok Ung, officials concerned, Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Andrei Gennadievich Karlov and his embassy officials.

articles.title: Greetings to Brazilian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Brazilian President
    Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Luiz Inacio Lula Da Silva, president of Brazil, on Sept. 7 on the occasion of the independence day of his country.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms, the message wished him great success in his responsible work for the sovereignty of the country, economic prosperity and welfare of his people.
